speaker: President.
english: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0173/2007 ) by Bernadette Vergnaud, on behalf of the Committee on Internal Market and Consumer Protection, on the impact and consequences of the exclusion of health services from the Directive on services in the internal market ( 2006/2275(INI) ).
original: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0173/2007 ) by Bernadette Vergnaud, on behalf of the Committee on Internal Market and Consumer Protection, on the impact and consequences of the exclusion of health services from the Directive on services in the internal market ( 2006/2275(INI) ).
agenda_item: The exclusion of health services from the Services Directive (debate)
